result.eng: I'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlogI'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a trí a ċlogI'll see you at three o'clock.

result.eng: We'll start at three o'clock.
result.ga: Tosóidh muid ar a trí a chlog
result.orig: Tosóidh muid ar a trí a chlog
result.html: Tosóidh muid ar a trí a chlogWe'll start at three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tosóiḋ muid ar a trí a ċlogWe'll start at three o'clock.

result.eng: I got up at eight in the morning.
result.ga: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.orig: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.html: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ mé ar a hoċt a ċlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.

result.eng: I'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlogI'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a ceaṫar a ċlogI'll see you at four o'clock.

result.eng: We came at about three o'clock.
result.ga: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.orig: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.html: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlogWe came at about three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig muid i dtráṫa a trí a ċlogWe came at about three o'clock.

result.eng: We expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ga: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.orig: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.html: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seaċt a ċlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.

result.eng: It is nine o'clock, I must go to work.
result.ga: Tá sé a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ag obair
result.orig: Tá sé a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ag obair
result.html: Tá sé a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ag obairIt is nine o'clock, I must go to work.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ag obairIt is nine o'clock, I must go to work.

result.eng: It is three o'clock.
result.ga: Tá sé a trí a chlog
result.orig: Tá sé a trí a chlog
result.html: Tá sé a trí a chlogIt is three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé a trí a ċlogIt is three o'clock.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.

result.eng: News is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin
result.orig: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin
result.html: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt le fáil ag a seaċt a ċlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.

result.eng: I usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ga: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.orig: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.html: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáthI usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Éirím ag a sé a ċlog de ġnáṫI usually wake at six o'clock.

result.eng: The first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ga: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.orig: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.html: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn an ċéad rang ag a hoċt a ċlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.

result.eng: I listen to the radio at 8.00.
result.ga: Éistim leis an raidió ag a hocht a chlog
result.orig: Éistim leis an raidió ag a hocht a chlog
result.html: Éistim leis an raidió ag a hocht a chlogI listen to the radio at 8.00.
result.ponchtml: Éistim leis an raidió ag a hoċt a ċlogI listen to the radio at 8.00.

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.html: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ga: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.orig: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.html: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabharI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ponchtml: Oibrím óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a haon a ċlog sa siopa leaḃarI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.

result.eng: I [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.
result.ga: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúig
result.orig: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúig
result.html: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúigI [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a cúigI [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock to one o'clock.
result.ga: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog
result.orig: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog
result.html: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlogI work from nine o'clock to one o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Oibrím óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a haon a ċlogI work from nine o'clock to one o'clock.

result.eng: It's on at eight o'clock on TG4.
result.ga: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hocht a chlog ar TG4
result.orig: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hocht a chlog ar TG4
result.html: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hocht a chlog ar TG4It's on at eight o'clock on TG4.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hoċt a ċlog ar TG4It's on at eight o'clock on TG4.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock.
result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlogIt's almost nine o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlogIt's almost nine o'clock.

result.eng: I'm at home every evening around six o'clock.
result.ga: Bím sa bhaile gach tráthnóna timpeall a sé a chlog
result.orig: Bím sa bhaile gach tráthnóna timpeall a sé a chlog
result.html: Bím sa bhaile gach tráthnóna timpeall a sé a chlogI'm at home every evening around six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Bím sa ḃaile gaċ tráṫnóna timpeall a sé a ċlogI'm at home every evening around six o'clock.

result.eng: I start working at nine o'clock.
result.ga: Tosaím ag obair ag a naoi a chlog
result.orig: Tosaím ag obair ag a naoi a chlog
result.html: Tosaím ag obair ag a naoi a chlogI start working at nine o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tosaím ag obair ag a naoi a ċlogI start working at nine o'clock.

result.eng: I'm home around six o'clock.
result.ga: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlog
result.orig: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlog
result.html: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlogI'm home around six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Bím sa ḃaile timpeall a sé a ċlogI'm home around six o'clock.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-EabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i Nua-EaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
